Package com.datastax.astra.sdk.organizations

Class OrganizationsClient

java.lang.Object
com.datastax.astra.sdk.organizations.OrganizationsClient
public class OrganizationsClient extends Object
Client for the Astra Devops API. The JDK11 client http is used and as such jdk11+ is required https://docs.datastax.com/en/astra/docs/_attachments/devopsv1.html
Author:
Cedrick LUNVEN (@clunven)
